title: Finding Your NHL Home Is Important
description:
Linda and Emily open up this episode talking about which teams across the league are powerhouses. After that, they sit down with Bruins' Taylor Hall to talk about everything from settling into a new city to what he would like to see the league do differently.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
